name: peruse
content:

Add to word list
to read through something, especially in order to find the part you are interested in: He opened a newspaper and began to peruse the personal ads.

to read or look at something in a relaxed way: He opened the newspaper and perused the sports pages.
Peruse can also mean to read carefully in a detailed way.
